verses.verse: Put them in <S%G5279>mind<s%> <S%G846><s%> to be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>powers,<s%> to obey <S%G3980>magistrates,<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%>

To speak <S%G987>evil<s%> of no <S%G3367>man,<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> no <S%G269>brawlers,<s%> but <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> <S%G1731>showing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3753>after<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5544>kindness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> love of God our Savior toward <S%G5363>man<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2257><s%> <S%G4990><s%> <S%G2014>appeared,<s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G4160>done,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> he <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G3824>regeneration,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G342>renewing<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost;<s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> being <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> we should be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

This is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> I <S%G1014>will<s%> that <S%G4571>thou<s%> affirm <S%G1226>constantly,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they which have <S%G4100>believed<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> might be <S%G5431>careful<s%> to <S%G4291>maintain<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%> These <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> unto <S%G444>men.<s%>
Knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he that is <S%G5108>such<s%> is <S%G1612>subverted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G264>sinneth,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> condemned of <S%G843>himself.<s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> I shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G734>Artemas<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus,<s%> be <S%G4704>diligent<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3533>Nicopolis:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G2919>determined<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> to <S%G3914>winter.<s%>

Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their <S%G4311>journey<s%> <S%G2211><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3544><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G625><s%> <S%G4709>diligently,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> be <S%G3007>wanting<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> them that <S%G5368>love<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith.<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
